short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simply allows you to read the weather in your place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension - get the weather news and updates in your homepage!

By adding this extension to chrome, you accept and agree to install the Weather Meter Chrome Extension, set the Chrome's New Tab search to Yahoo, and to the Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.  

You can find the Terms of Use and the Privacy Policy in our website:
https://weather-meter.com/
